channel.title: Minecraft 1.2.3 Trolling meh
channel.description: since 1.2.3 ( i think ) I cant play any servers... he cant contact someone else got it? i deleted .minecraft nothing works

item.title: Minecraft 1.2.3 Trolling meh
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“triston001, post:5, topic:436012”]deleting .minecraft just deletes everything and when you play your client it will do most recent version (1.2.3)
when it starts up again. so instead, go into .minecraft, delete bin, and download a 1.1 bin, which can be given to you on this server if someone will be so kind as to provide the link, then blace the bin in .minecraft[/quote]What’s the point of deleting the entire bin file? Why not just do what all other people do, and just delete the minecraft.jar inside the bin file? Then all you have to do is fine the version of minecraft you want, and place it in the bin file.

http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,524930.msg3821096.html#msg3821096

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft 1.2.3 Trolling meh
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

deleting .minecraft just deletes everything and when you play your client it will do most recent version (1.2.3)
when it starts up again. so instead, go into .minecraft, delete bin, and download a 1.1 bin, which can be given to you on this server if someone will be so kind as to provide the link, then blace the bin in .minecraft

Read full topic
